SELECT id, categoryId1, categoryId2, title, detile, price, pictureUrls, userId, tagIds, `status`, clicks, createTime, updateTime, managerId,`type`,unit,`count`,endTime FROM (SELECT id, categoryId1, categoryId2, title, detile, price, pictureUrls, userId, tagIds, `status`, clicks, createTime, updateTime, managerId,`type`,unit,`count`,endTime FROM supply a where a.userId=#{userId} UNION ALL SELECT id, categoryId1, categoryId2, title, detile, price, pictureUrls, userId, tagIds, `status`, clicks, createTime, updateTime, managerId,`type`,unit,`count`,endTime FROM buy b where b.userId=#{userId}) t ORDER BY t.updateTime DESC

SELECT id, categoryId1, categoryId2, title, detile, price, pictureUrls, userId, tagIds, `status`, clicks, createTime, updateTime, managerId,`type`,unit,`count`,endTime,collectTime FROM (SELECT t1.createTime collectTime,a.* FROM collect t1 LEFT JOIN supply a ON t1.supplyId=a.id AND t1.collectType='supply' where t1.userId=#{userId} UNION ALL SELECT t2.createTime collectTime,b.* FROM collect t2 LEFT JOIN buy b ON t2.buyId=b.id AND t2.collectType='buy' where t2.userId=#{userId}) t ORDER BY t.collectTime DESC
